name: Resident Evil 1.5 Fan Remake
description:
This is a fan game and it was made without any intention to make profit. Please support Capcom buying their games.

The game is a recreation of the cancelled version of Resident Evil 2. This is an alpha version, the final game will include fixed camera mode. The purpose of this project is recreate full version of Resident Evil 1.5 in a new graphic engine. On his current state the game has no ending and only inlcudes a portion of the police station.

If you have any information of the original game please contact me on any of my social networks:

https://www.twitch.tv/mrquesadilla

https://twitter.com/mr_quesadillas

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3MjGmjh7UmzyAFvZF4N-2A
